attributes.action: Stop big tech companies, I. E twitter, utube, Google, preventing free speech.
attributes.additional_details: Our parents grandparents and their parents and grandparents, fought and died for freedom of speech and liberty, and now big tech companies are taking our freedoms from us.
attributes.background: Stop big tech companies taking away our fundamental rights to express free speech

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the terms and conditions of individual social media companies. It is up to individual users whether to use particular social media applications.
